title: Millennial investor Q&A: how do I know if an investment is a scam?
text:
Marianna Hunt answers readers' questions about her attempts to invest her way on to the property ladder

I’m on a mission to beat the odds and use the stock market to take my first steps onto the property ladder within a decade. After 10 columns and a lot of Googling, I’m finally starting to get to grips with investing – but there’s always more to learn.

I want to share this knowledge as much as possible so I’ll be answering questions and concerns sent to me by readers following my column every month.

In previous columns, I’ve explained how I chose the first fund I invested in, looked at how to get free money towards your first home − and avoid hefty fees, and discovered how to invest my money...
description: Marianna Hunt answers readers' questions about her attempts to invest her way on to the property ladder
